attributes.action: introduce the medieval stocks for every town to deal with problem youth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The introduction of the 'stocks' would enable a society to deal with problem youth by shaming and embarrassing them into thinking twice the next time they were anti-social. Soft tomatoes being thrown at them would make them seriously think twice next time and it may remove the badge of honour theory about ASBOs. Would they really brag about that humiliation.
